script:
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
# voice 5008 "bashosen_0001"
@芭蕉扇
ねぇ、あなた…

# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
@芭蕉扇
うふふふ…
突然だけど、
クイズのコーナーよ！

# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
@芭蕉扇
もう、いいからつきあって頂戴！

# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@芭蕉扇
さあ、いくわよ！

@芭蕉扇
私のポリシーを
あなたは知ってるわよね？

# se "SE_0734"
# select "売られた喧嘩は買う" "select_label_1" "出されたご飯は食べる" "select_label_2" "お風呂は必ず最初" "select_label_3"
私のポリシーを
あなたは知ってるわよね？

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
